Module analysis.namespace

Namespace handling.

Classes
NamespaceRegister A name register for a given namespace.

Exceptions
ScopeError An exception indicating that a node previously associated with a particular scope has also been associated with another scope, thus suggesting an error situation.

Function Summary
  get_locals_layout(node, qualified_names, include_parameters)
Return a list of tuples of the form (name, definition-nodes) indicating the layout of parameter and local variable definitions for the given function (or other namespace-bearing) 'node'.

Function Details

get_locals_layout(node, qualified_names=0, include_parameters=1)

Return a list of tuples of the form (name, definition-nodes) indicating the layout of parameter and local variable definitions for the given function (or other namespace-bearing) 'node'.
